description: a(n) = least positive integer > a(n-1) and not a(i)*a(j) for 1<=i<j<=n.
links: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: a = {2, 4}; used = {a[[1]]*a[[2]]}; Do[k = a[[-1]] + 1; While[MemberQ[used, k], k++]; used = Union[used, k*a]; AppendTo[a, k], {n, 3, 60}]; a (* _Ivan Neretin_, Mar 07 2016 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
